website_summaries.verdict: This Spirograph solves the problem of slipping gears by placing them in a frame and making them bigger.
pros: A set that younger children can handle more easily
Fits a 5 x 7 piece of paper
Set allows younger children the ability to enjoy what can normally require too much dexterity for their age
cons: While this set is good for young kids, the holes on the gears are still too small for crayons

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 4 year old girl who loves drawing - she was able to manipulate and use it by herself and really enjoyed it! Sturdy, made well. Case is nice to keep track of the pieces. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allison B

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5yr old and 3yr old both love it (of course we had to buy two) It’s easy to use and they have a lot of fun playing with them. The only con is that it comes with markers and the holes are too small for crayons. IMO this basically makes it unusable on a road trip situation. I know pencils and pencil colors work too but they also have a sharper point which can be dangerous for younger kids when not being monitored.
customer_reviews.author: ruffle

customer_reviews.title: JR better for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought the regular version for my 7 1/2 year old and she was frustrated as fear teeth were too small and the moving of the ring. The junior version solves both problems and also is compact for travel or restaurants. Knocking a star off because it doesn’t latch very well but I still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JMmommy

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for youngsters
customer_reviews.text: Santa Claus brought this toy last Christmas to my son and he played with it so much that there is no doubt about Santa's cleverness. The materials are sturdy, well designed, and the size of the pad is perfect for travels. The drawings are simpler than those obtained with the regular Spirograph but it is perfect for kids from 3 to 7. The only con I found is that there are to few paper sheets and a refill would have been much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: JulieT

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set! My 4 year old daughter has fun ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set! My 4 year old daughter has fun with it. She will need more practice to do it completely on her own, but she still really likes it. I enjoy it too. Very well made and includes paper and markers. I also bought it for my 5 year old niece as a gift. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny R.

customer_reviews.title: 5 yr old LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old nephew LOVES this! He went through all the paper in his first time of using it. Still holding up after a few months, and he knows all the gears have to be put away cause if he loses one he can’t make the cool pics anymore. The markers are kinda eh, but I bought him a set of crayola broad markers at the dollar tree and they’re a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: K. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: A Great Introduction to the Spirograph for Youngsters
customer_reviews.text: I had a Spirograph when I was young, so I wanted to get one for my six-year-old. We were worried that she wouldn't have the motor skills to use it without frustration, so we got her the Spirograph Jr. It's great because it holds everything in place so she can just move the pen around and create the pictures. She loves it and has no trouble using it. Also, almost any pen, pencil, or thin marker works with it, so when the markers it comes with go dry, they're easy to replace. When the paper in the kit runs out, a regular piece of typing paper cut in half works great.
customer_reviews.author: keir0bin

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loved this gift...she ran out of paper in like 3 days...but if you cut a piece of computer paper in half...it works just the same!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Chmielewski

customer_reviews.title: Good for 4 - 8 yr old
customer_reviews.text: 4 1/2 yr old granddaughter loves this. The wheels are just large enough for her to align in the base unit and turn without it being too difficult for her. Not like the smaller ones we had in the old days that liked to skip around. This comes with a few disks and markers and a good supply of papers that fit in the base unit and as storage. Nice little gift.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my great-granddaughter and I think ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my great-granddaughter and I think she is a bit too young for the idea of the Spirograph, because she loves markers and just wants to color with them. She likes the design the Spirograph makes, but would rather color at this point.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Stoff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing :)
customer_reviews.text: I love the original spirograph, and my son loves to do it with me. We decided to get the JR version so he could practice the motions to eventually use the smaller/original pieces. He LOVES JR! I may have even gotten wrapped up in it for a few hours ;) It works great with all the markers we have (normal/fatter crayola, and fine tip), and it all stays super neat and organized in the case.
customer_reviews.author: blondie

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Its like it was designed for younger kids with little fingers. It would be difficult for them to keep on the paper. To elementary for kids that would have an easier time using it. Really compact and easy to put away and store
customer_reviews.author: Pam Evans

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sauce!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So many possible designs and colors! I also appreciate how everything fits inside the little lap desk case. Perfect for keeping your child occupied while you are working from home. Once it’s safe to travel, we will definitely bring this in the car or plane rides to occupy our son on trips too.
customer_reviews.author: Alyss

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller hands
customer_reviews.text: I sent this Spirograph Junior to my 4 year old granddaughter who’s been quarantined for 2 months .. I’m hearing from her mom that she loves it .. They have the adult version which is impossible to use by little hands . Apparently this one is the perfect size for her and she is having lots of fun with it ..
customer_reviews.author: Susan VR

customer_reviews.title: A kids Spirograph that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Need I say more? This spirograph for kids actually works. The new set up holds the outer ring in place so that the kids can focus on working the inner ring. My 4yo can do this w/o help. I really like the set up, it stores all the gears, paper & markers in one box so you can easily take it with you. The paper supplied with the kit is smaller than half of an 8.5x11 sheet of paper but I think cutting 8.5x11 sheets of paper in half would still work just as well when the paper supplied with the kit runs out.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Henke

customer_reviews.title: Great spirograph for young kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is a big improvement over spirograph from when I was a kid (which was a long time ago). This spirograph kit is for young kids and it is absolutely wonderful. My twins at age 3 and now at age 4 love doing this kit. It is very easy for them to do and makes really great designs. I highly recommend this and have bought this for gifts for friends too. I wish they would sell extra paper pads, but you don't need them. After you run out of paper, you can just cut regular 8.5x11 white, copy paper in half and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids still love this classic!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my oldest granddaughter and she loves it. In a few more years, I will be able to purchase the regular Spirograph for her. I do with the Junior version came with more paper.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiagirl34

customer_reviews.title: Great option for young children
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Jr for our 3 year old grandson, and the regular edition for our creative seven year old granddaughter. She and I both like this one better! It is compact, sturdy, and super functional, in addition to being fun and exciting. The 3 year old isn't interested yet, but we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Novice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner set
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this. It's the perfect intro to the traditional set. He loves to use the book it comes with to pick the patterns he wants. The color and letter coding is easy for him to understand without help. And I love that everything stores nicely inside the case. Plus the paper is exactly a half a printer sheet, so no need to buy expensive replacement pads.
customer_reviews.author: Rachems

customer_reviews.title: Hand eye coordination art set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of spiro art for little ones. My little one was obsessed with this set for weeks. I like that it comes with a simple instructions and sample drawings. Wish there are more paper included in the set since we ran out and had to use both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Trusted Advisor

customer_reviews.title: So much fun even at 35 and brought back memories of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my seven year old niece. My dog ended up pulling it out from under the Christmas tree and unwrapping it and tearing up the box. I ordered a replacement for my niece, but figured I might as well test out the damaged one. So much fun even at 35 and brought back memories of the 80's! My niece also loved hers!
customer_reviews.author: Djj2018

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping kid busy
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for my five year old daughter. It’s provided a lot of busy time. It’s easy to use. For her little hands. The case opens up to hold all the supplies. I do wish the pens clicked in securely instead of being just set loose in the case.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Fun designs
customer_reviews.text: This is a craft I wanted for my grandchildren. I had the original Spirograph for my children but this is a smaller version and perfect for younger ages. Sure to keep all ages busy with all kinds of fun creations!
customer_reviews.author: Rev. DHK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy
customer_reviews.text: This is great. The range of designes possible is great for a kid and it's very easy to use. Best of all, the sheets are about exactly half of a sheet of A5 paper; making it easy to obtain more sheets after exhausting the pad.
customer_reviews.author: ScienceG

customer_reviews.title: Great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the original Spirograph would be too complicated for my little ones, so I opted for the Junior version. It is excellent! Both my 6 and 3 year old enjoy playing with it, and my 6 year old has made some pretty cool pictures! Will probably buy him the original version so they can each have their own. Only wish you could buy replacement pads of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A.

customer_reviews.title: Make Great Designes
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Spirograph and Spirograph Jr. didn't let me down. Children love it and spend hours making different designes and coloring them. Promotes creativity. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: great for small hands and easy to learn for kids
customer_reviews.text: I loved spirograph when I was a kid, and was so excited to see they had a jr version. I got this for my child when she turned 5. She quickly figured out how to do it on her own, after being shown once or twice, and is now able to follow the instructions to create some of the animal images that come in the instructions. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Herald

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my five-year-old granddaughter and it's perfect! It was easy for her to use and I like how convenient it is having the storage box attached. Definitely a good investment!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Andrews

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo loves this and has made some very nice pictures! Dislikes would be that its easy to loose some of the pieces & I thought it was gonna be a little bit bigger than it was.. Overall though i'm happy with the purchase and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for 3 year old girl who loves drawing, ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 3 year old girl who loves drawing, she loves it so much. Product itself is well-made hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry L

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This was Christmas gift for grandchildren. I am told they really enjoy it. Grandchildren are always asking to make something and this was a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Great motor skill for children
customer_reviews.text: Work with younger children who can’t use the adult Spirograph........they were so happy to make creations of their own......children do need to learn motor control using this but when they finally get it...they are sooooo proud!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Loveday

customer_reviews.title: Markers are not washable markers
customer_reviews.text: The markers are not washable markets. That’s a big problem in my household where things get dropped and clothes get accidentally bumped.
customer_reviews.author: jaclyn c allmon

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome
customer_reviews.text: Super great little spirograph with it’s own case. No loose pieces great for my 5 yr old. I would completely buy it again, or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi_liz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for a 4 year old but not ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for a 4 year old but not too simple for ones a little older. Good quality, not flimsy, plastic. All of the pieces including the markers nest in designated slots in the interior compartment making this set completely self-contained which is wonderful for storage. Great little creative toy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smallback

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my toddler and I love it because it's small enough to fit on his lap. It comes with a book of ideas on things to create. He will spend hours making different designs!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie O

customer_reviews.title: It’s sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for my 5 year old. It’s sturdy and easy to use. We also have the standard Spirograph and it’s difficult for him to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Fun, artsy gift that everyone loves!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids loved these! They are twins, age 7. My daughter said they are used all the time, so I think ot was a great purchase! They are holding up well....and there are 5 kids in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Alive Farms

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. My 8yo son wanted one for his birthday and I wanted something that was easy to use and travels well. The case is perfect for holding all of the pieces (I’m a neat freak!).
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Definitely not like the original. My Grands wouldn't even use it as it kept falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for pre-school age kids
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect for pre-school age. I was impressed how quickly my four year old learned how to use it. All of the pieces store in the case. I wish I could find refill paper. Regular printer paper would be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: great creative gift.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my grandkids for Christmas. Their older sister has a bigger set but its hard for their little hands to keep still and they get frustrated. This one was great for them. the way it hold the rings in place helps them be able to move the wheels around without the whole thing sliding. They have had so much fun showing each other their creations. The frig is now well decorated.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters were very happy with this, and could do it themselves. They made some pretty things right away!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Waldroup

customer_reviews.title: markers do not wash off easily
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got the marker on her hands and we could not wash it off. Had to wash multiple times with soap and then spray her hands with alcohol a few times. Also not as easy to use as I remember. Would like to return.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena Zaytseva

customer_reviews.title: Very engaging for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson has spent hours using this to make many different designs. Very engaging for young and old alike.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son LOVED this gift and plays with it all the time. My nieces are 7 and 8, and they both played with it as well. It comes in a nice carry case to put all the markers and pieces away. Wish it used standard size paper, that’s my only negative.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 4 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a regular spirograph but it took too much coordination. Then I found this one and it has been a big hit. So helplful to have its own carrying case for keeping things together. My granddaughter has been using it almost non-stop since getting it. The adults are reminiscing over their spirograph days.
customer_reviews.author: Corry

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for children.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this. He is really enjoying using it and making some art work. Best birthday present he received this year.
customer_reviews.author: Medeck

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for a student. She loves it. It is easy to use She has spent hours creating a wide variety of drawings.
customer_reviews.author: Wali Chow

customer_reviews.title: Nice “first” Spirograph kit for younger children.
customer_reviews.text: Nice version of Spirograph for smaller kids. Good quality. Holds the paper in place to help make producing the designs easier.
customer_reviews.author: ShopShopShop

customer_reviews.title: Ho hum
customer_reviews.text: My six year old granddaughter enjoyed playing with this a few times but got easily bored.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: She Loved!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old is entertained for hours on this thing. I played on it as well. Brought back childhood memories. So glad we could share something from my childhood to hers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Quick grab to put into the kid's activity bag when we are in the car
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on the go activity
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for young kids. My 5 year old can independently play with this, and I love that it can travel easily. Perfect for road trips!
customer_reviews.author: MegM

customer_reviews.title: ... Birthday but we've all been having a lot of fun with it
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughter's 4th Birthday but we've all been having a lot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: PV

customer_reviews.title: The gears are perfect for her to manipulate by herself
customer_reviews.text: My preschooler loves this spirograph. The gears are perfect for her to manipulate by herself. She loves spending time with her parents and grandparents doing "spirograph" as she says. Great product. Love the drawing guide for how to draw animals and other creatures. Love it! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it to invest in a nice set of gelpens or watercolor pencils to go with ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for christmas for niece and nephew and I think they were a bigger hit with the parents, haha! These things bring the whole family together. It's worth it to invest in a nice set of gelpens or watercolor pencils to go with this.
customer_reviews.author: Allyn Rasmusen

customer_reviews.title: My son hated this for Christmas.  It was cheap, confusing, and not fun.,
customer_reviews.text: My son hated this for Christmas. It was cheap, confusing, and not fun.,
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Lawson

customer_reviews.title: My 4 years old grandson played with this the whole ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 years old grandson played with this the whole week he was here! We had to post his pictures everywhere he was so thrilled with it. He picked it right up. No learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old was able to use it with very little help. It kept him interested. And the "almost 4" year old enjoyed it too.
customer_reviews.author: LStrick

customer_reviews.title: My girl loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My lil girl loved this toy and it brings back memories for me from back in the day.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just like I remember, 4 year old really enjoys it. Great size for little kids!
customer_reviews.author: S. Redd

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a creative child
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5-year-old grandson and he loves it! Always sending us pictures of his "art" - he's very creative with the disks and colors. So far after several months he still loves creating designs with it.
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for budding artists
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had this when I was a kid! For kids 6 and under who may struggle to hold the gears in place, this tool makes it easy. They also provide examples of fun drawings kids can make out of their spiral art - perfect for pre-K!
customer_reviews.author: Ed U. Kaytor

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loves this.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved this gift. Easy to use and kept her busy for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I like the set but I felt it was a little high on the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Dube

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: So sad. When I was a kid these were super easy to use. This is cheesy plastic. Sorry :(

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old grandson and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda S.

customer_reviews.title: spirograph junior
customer_reviews.text: I love spirograph when I was a kid but it was very difficult for a child to use. This version is so easy, even my 4 year old granddaughter loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger and thicker set up than original Spirograph.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for young kids, a more manageable version for little hands

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old and 5 year old do really well with and bring it out all the time to design. They can both do it completely on their own and the designs they make come out really nice. Very pleased with it.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: My dad always bought me this when I was little. Super entertaining.

customer_reviews.text: Too much for a 5 year old to digest. I don't even know where all of the parts went.

customer_reviews.title: Keep in hand
customer_reviews.text: Great game to have on hand when grandkids come over

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew as a gift. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hite

customer_reviews.title: Fun for 6 y.o. Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun but maybe a little too much for my 3 year old granddaughter. But 6 year old grandson loves it!!!! All in all very nice product that at least keeps them occupied for 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Stacdg

customer_reviews.title: Good Toy For 4 Year Olds
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for a young child just learning to use crayons and pencils. My Grandsons 4 years old and he loved it. It was perfect for his eye hand coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Preschool Spirograph.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 4 year old to be just like his big sister. Loved the storage of the wheels. Super durable for little kid usage.
customer_reviews.author: mbbcgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great first Spirograph!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and Fun. Not too many pieces. Our kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Janet K.

customer_reviews.title: Spirograph Jr Is The Best
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice for my 3 year old Granddaughter who absolutely loves this Spirograph Jr for her beautiful pictures she draws. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a gift idea here on Amazon. Com
customer_reviews.author: 4 oclocks

customer_reviews.title: Great for little ones to use independently
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was too young to easily use a regular Spirograph without assistance, so I bought this. It is excellent. It has a nice variety of gears and the paper sits snuggly in the frame. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: SDL

customer_reviews.title: But this one for kids between 4-7 yr
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 5 yr old . Helps improve his pincer grip

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this as a kid and love to watch how much my grand loves this!!! It's well made, easy to tote, stimulates creativity, uses fine motor skills...
customer_reviews.author: michael sparks

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, your child will make more pictures than your fridge can handle, easy to store,self contained.

customer_reviews.title: yet it makes pictures similar enough to the regular one that she feels like a big kid
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 5.5 year old. She absolutely loves it. It's simple enough for her to operate; yet it makes pictures similar enough to the regular one that she feels like a big kid. We love the creative idea book that comes with it too.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old granddaughter loved the spirograph. I am looking forward to spending time doodling with her.

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for the younger kids
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the younger kids. Our granddaughter is seven and she does pretty well with it. Once she figures out how to keep along the edges as she rolls, it'll be great!

customer_reviews.title: Great for any age!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift. The spirograph is another one of those timeless toys. I had one as a child and loved it.

customer_reviews.text: Was a great Xmas gift for our son. He loved it! The case is great too.

customer_reviews.text: The kid loves it, she's been playing with it like crazy. You can get printable paper for it at their website when you run out, which with my kid happened quickly.

customer_reviews.title: People can be happy with simple things..
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it . And she is forty nine !

customer_reviews.title: Four year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a four year old and she loved it. Easy to use, kept her entertained for a long time. Not as good as the original but did the job

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ! everything fits in the case very easy for young kids to use much better than the original version my four-year-old can do it very easily.

customer_reviews.text: Solid plastic. Good travel size. Pens dry and don’t like that it isn’t standard paper size.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson, who loves to draw, really liked this. It was just right in the sturdiness of the gears, case and pieces. When the paper ran out, we just used 1/2 sheets of regular copy paper and it works fine.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for six year old.
customer_reviews.text: This was gift for our great granddaughter, and she loves it! Endless entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Spirograph Jr.
product_meta.description: Little artists can now create beautiful patterned art pieces with the Spirograph Jr. Designed for small hands and growing minds, this set comes with jumbo gears and 5 washable markers. The handy drawing tablet doubles as a storage case and work station. Instructions and design sheets are also included so kids can start drawing right away.
feature_bullets: CREATED WITH JUNIOR ASPIRING ARTISTS IN MIND! The large design gears are easy to work with, and our instruction guide shows young imaginations how to turn Spirograph designs into awesome pictures!
ASPIRING ARTIST OF ALL AGES can draw colorful, spiraling designs with Jumbo-size pieces, washable markers, built-in storage, cool carrying case and drawing desk!
SET INCLUDES - 4 Gears, 1 Gear Ring, 5 Art Markers, 24-Page Design Paper Pad, 8-Page Design Guide Book, and Carry-Along Case with Built-In Design Desk, Storage and Gear Frame
INSPIRED BY THE ORIGINAL 1965 SPIROGRAPH! Brought to you by Kahootz Toys, where we use our all our creative skills and passions to bring exciting, engaging kids' products into a world of play

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
